NDAlias(AliasFile)

A category of the class NDAlias

Extends Class: NDAlias
Declared In: NDAlias+AliasFile

Discussion

This category add aditional functionality to NDAlias for reading and writting NDAlias instances to Finder alias files. Though this could be used for archiving purposed, the methods of the adopted protocol NSCoding are proble better suited. The method of NDAlias (AliasFile) are mainly for creating alias files that are visible in Finder to the user.

As well as the class NDAlias and the classes and categories it uses, NDAlias (AliasFile) also requires the class NDResourceFork and it's category NDResourceFork (OtherSorces). If the additional functioanlity of NDAlias (AliasFile) is not required then the files for NDAlias (AliasFile), NDResourceFork and NDResourceFork (OtherSorces) can be excluded from your project.

@helperclass NDResourceFork is requried to read and write to the alias file resource fork.


Groups

Create an alias file from an alias

Group members:

-writeToFile:

Writes an NDAlias to a Finder alias file.

-writeToFile:includeCustomIcon:

Writes an NDAlias to a Finder alias file.

-writeToURL:

Writes an NDAlias to a Finder alias file.

-writeToURL:includeCustomIcon:

Writes an NDAlias to a Finder alias file.

aliasWithContentsOfFile:

Creates and initalises a NDAlias. 

+ (id)aliasWithContentsOfFile:(NSString *)path;
Parameters
path

the path to an alias file.

Return Value

A NDAlias instance, returns nil if NDAlias creation fails.

Discussion

The method aliasWithContentsOfFile: allocates and initalises an NDAlias with the alias record data within the Finder alias file pointed to by the NSString path path.

aliasWithContentsOfURL:

Initalises a NDAlias. 

+ (id)aliasWithContentsOfURL:(NSURL *)URL;
Parameters
URL

the file url to the alias file.

Return Value

A NDAlias instance, returns nil if NDAlias creation fails.

Discussion

The method aliasWithContentsOfURL: allocates and initalises an NDAlias with the alias record data within the Finder NSURL alias file pointed to pay the file url URL

initWithContentsOfFile:

Initalises a NDAlias. 

- (id)initWithContentsOfFile:(NSString *)path;
Parameters
path

the path to the alias file.

Return Value

An initalises NDAlias, returns nil if initalises fails.

Discussion

The method initWithContentsOfFile: initalises the reciever with the alias record data within the Finder alias file pointed to by the NSString path path

initWithContentsOfURL:

Initalises a NDAlias. 

- (id)initWithContentsOfURL:(NSURL *)URL;
Parameters
URL

the file url to the alias file.

Return Value

An initalises NDAlias, returns nil if initalises fails.

Discussion

The method initWithContentsOfURL: initalises the reciever with the alias record data within the Finder NSURL alias file pointed to pay the file url URL.

writeToFile:

Writes an NDAlias to a Finder alias file. 

- (BOOL)writeToFile:(NSString *)path;
Parameters
path

the path for the alias file. Not the path the alias record represents.

Return Value

<#result#>

Discussion

Calls writeToFile:includeCustomIcon: with the parameter customIcon set to YES.

writeToFile:includeCustomIcon:

Writes an NDAlias to a Finder alias file. 

- (BOOL)writeToFile:(NSString *)path includeCustomIcon:(BOOL)customIcon;
Parameters
path

the path for the alias file. Not the path the alias record represents.

customIcon

inlcude custom icon if required.

Return Value

<#result#>

Discussion

The method writeToFile: writes the alias record data contained within the reciever to a Finder alias file at the path path. writeToFile: can be used to create alias files that the user can see in Finder and use. If the target file of for the alias has a custom icon or is an application then the customIcon can be used to included a custom icon for the alias identical to the target.

writeToURL:

Writes an NDAlias to a Finder alias file. 

- (BOOL)writeToURL:(NSURL *)URL;
Parameters
URL

the file url for the alias file. Not the file url the alias record represents.

Return Value

<#result#>

Discussion

Calls writeToFile:includeCustomIcon: with the parameter customIcon set to YES.

writeToURL:includeCustomIcon:

Writes an NDAlias to a Finder alias file. 

- (BOOL)writeToURL:(NSURL *)URL includeCustomIcon:(BOOL)customIcon;
Parameters
URL

the file url for the alias file. Not the file url the alias record represents.

customIcon

inlcude custom icon if required.

Return Value

<#result#>

Discussion

The method writeToURL: writes the alias record data contained within the reciever to a Finder alias file at the file url URL. writeToFile: can be used to create alias files that the user can see in Finder and use.. If the target file of for the alias has a custom icon or is an application then the customIcon can be used to included a custom icon for the alias identical to the target.
